properties.areaDesc: Martin, IN; Lawrence, IN; Jackson, IN; Monroe, IN; Bartholomew, IN; Greene, IN; Brown, IN
properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 11 at 8:42AM EST until January 11 at 11:45AM EST by NWS Indianapolis IN
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Indianapolis has issued a

* Flood Warning for...
Monroe County in south central Indiana...
Brown County in south central Indiana...
Bartholomew County in central Indiana...
Martin County in southwestern Indiana...
Southeastern Greene County in southwestern Indiana...
Lawrence County in south central Indiana...
Jackson County in south central Indiana...

* Until 1145 AM EST.

* At 841 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated a band of heavy rain with
embedded thunder extending from near Nashville to Bedford and
moving east. This band will produce a quick half inch to inch of
rain and cause flooding.

* Some locations that will experience flooding include...
Bloomington, Columbus, Seymour, Bedford, Brownstown, Nashville,
Shoals, Ellettsville, Edinburgh, Mitchell, Loogootee, Hope, Princes
Lakes, Oolitic, Medora, Elizabethtown, Clifford, Jonesville,
Newbern and Smithville.
properties.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood
deaths occur in vehicles.

In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are
potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded
roads. Find an alternate route.

A Flood Warning means that flooding is imminent or occurring. All
interested parties should take necessary precautions immediately.
